name: iPhone 16 Pro
description: Latest Apple flagship with A18 Pro chip, titanium design, and advanced camera system.
reviews_summary: Excellent camera and performance. Best iPhone yet.

name: Samsung Galaxy S25
description: Samsung's flagship with Snapdragon 8 Elite, Galaxy AI, and stunning display.
reviews_summary: Great AI features and smooth performance. Excellent display.

name: MacBook Air M4
description: Ultra-thin laptop with Apple M4 chip, all-day battery life, and Liquid Retina display.
reviews_summary: Best ultrabook on the market. Incredible battery life and performance.

name: Sony WH-1000XM6
description: Premium noise-cancelling headphones with 40-hour battery and Hi-Res Audio.
reviews_summary: Best noise cancellation in the market. Incredibly comfortable for long sessions.

name: Apple AirPods Pro 3
description: True wireless earbuds with adaptive noise cancellation and spatial audio.
reviews_summary: Seamless Apple ecosystem integration. Great sound quality and ANC.
